meanings.sent1: The bounteous baker shared cookies with everyone.
meanings.sent2: The bounteous harvest provided food for the whole village.
meanings.sent3: The bounteous squirrel shared its nuts with the other animals.
meanings.sent4: Her bounteous heart overflowed with kindness towards others.
meanings.sent5: The bounteous rain nourished the thirsty plants in the garden.

meanings.sent1: The bounteous field was filled with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: The bounteous buffet offered a wide variety of dishes.
meanings.sent3: The bounteous gift basket was overflowing with goodies.
meanings.sent4: His bounteous collection of stamps amazed his friends.
meanings.sent5: The bounteous forest was home to many different animals.

meanings.sent1: The bounteous king shared his riches with the people.
meanings.sent2: The bounteous feast celebrated the successful harvest.
meanings.sent3: The bounteous laughter of children filled the playground.
meanings.sent4: Her bounteous spirit lifted the mood of everyone around her.
